general.description:
Another pirate base posing as an abandonned station, Aan-Relink lies near the Aan-route, but it has more hardships to overcome than Aan-Imod, because it has no link to another target zone.
However, it is rumored that some nearby systems might have been purgatorian colonies millenia ago and still hold valuable remnants. This has prompted exploration expeditions, some of which never came back..
